Abstract.AbstractText: Coxsackieviruses (CV) are ubiquitous and widespread single-stranded RNA viruses belonging to the Picornaviridae family and the genus Enterovirus, which also includes poliovirus (PV), the best known of the enteroviruses (EV) [...].
